remarks: Negated conjunction in terms of disjunction (DeMorgan's law).  Theorem *4.51 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 120, but where one proposition is decidable.  The reverse direction, ~ pm3.14 , holds for all propositions, but the equivalence only holds where one proposition is decidable. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 21-Apr-2018.)
statement: ianordc $p |- ( DECID ph -> ( -. ( ph /\ ps ) <-> ( -. ph \/ -. ps ) ) ) $.
